skill.name: cosmic-database
skill.description: Access COSMIC cancer mutation database. Query somatic mutations, Cancer Gene Census, mutational signatures, gene fusions, for cancer research and precision oncology. Requires authentication.
skill.summary: Access COSMIC cancer mutation database. Query somatic mutations, Cancer Gene Census, mutational sign...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: The skill performs authenticated HTTPS requests to the COSMIC download service and saves files locally. No code execution, persistence, or obfuscation is present.

content.value_statement: You need authenticated access to COSMIC cancer mutation files. This skill downloads COSMIC datasets and provides common file paths for fast setup.
actual_capabilities: Request authenticated download URLs from the COSMIC service
Stream file downloads with progress output
Save downloaded datasets to a chosen filename
Resolve common COSMIC file paths by data type and assembly
Provide a CLI for data type, version, and output selection
limitations: Requires a registered COSMIC account with valid credentials
Needs network access to the COSMIC download service
Supports only the predefined data type shortcuts
Does not analyze or validate downloaded datasets

use_cases.title: Download mutation exports
use_cases.description: Fetch COSMIC coding mutation files for a chosen genome assembly and release.

use_cases.title: Automate dataset sync
use_cases.description: Script repeatable COSMIC downloads for pipeline inputs and audits.

use_cases.title: Retrieve gene census
use_cases.description: Download the Cancer Gene Census file for gene prioritization workflows.

prompt_templates.title: First download
prompt_templates.prompt: Download the latest COSMIC coding mutations for GRCh38 and save as cosmic_mutations.tsv.gz.

prompt_templates.title: Gene census file
prompt_templates.prompt: Get the Cancer Gene Census for GRCh38 and save it as cancer_gene_census.csv.

prompt_templates.title: Versioned release
prompt_templates.prompt: Download COSMIC v102 structural variants for GRCh37 and save as cosmic_structural.tsv.gz.

prompt_templates.title: Custom filepath
prompt_templates.prompt: Download the file at GRCh38/cosmic/latest/CosmicResistanceMutations.tsv.gz and save as resistance.tsv.gz.

output_examples.input: Download the latest Cancer Gene Census for GRCh38.
output: Requested the COSMIC download URL for the gene census file
Saved as cancer_gene_census.csv in the current folder

best_practices: Use latest for current work and fixed versions for reproducibility
Check disk space before large downloads
Keep credentials out of shared logs and notebooks
anti_patterns: Running downloads without a valid COSMIC account
Expecting data analysis or filtering within the downloader
Assuming a file exists without checking version and assembly

faq.question: Is this compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code?
faq.answer: Yes. It is a Python script and CLI that can be used in those environments.

faq.question: What limits apply to downloads?
faq.answer: Limits depend on COSMIC access rights and the size of the requested files.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with pipelines?
faq.answer: Yes. The CLI and helper functions support scripted workflows.

faq.question: Does it store or transmit my credentials?
faq.answer: Credentials are used only for COSMIC authentication and are not stored locally.

faq.question: What should I do if authentication fails?
faq.answer: Verify registration, license status, email, and password for COSMIC access.

faq.question: How does this compare to web downloads?
faq.answer: It enables automated, repeatable downloads with consistent file path helpers.
